creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: hair pin is thicker on pin end; center twisted; top motif is dragon head and torso made from coiled wire and solid silver; circle of spheres around dragon's body where it attaches to pin; dragon mouth open; chain with three leaf-like motifs and one chime-like charm hanging down from mouth
dimension: 7 1/4 x 2 1/2 x 3/4 in. (18.42 x 6.35 x 1.91 cm) (with chains dangling)
title: Hair Pin
